alert.note: Alert for Talbot (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 12 at 7:24PM EDT until July 12 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM EDT FOR WEST CENTRAL SUSSEX...SOUTHWESTERN KENT...NORTHEASTERN TALBOT... EASTERN QUEEN ANNE`S AND CAROLINE COUNTIES... At 723 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hope to near Denton to near Tanyard, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Wind damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... Dover, Easton, Centerville, Denton, Centreville, Harrington, Camden, Federalsburg, Greensboro, Oakland, Ridgely, Cheswold, Church Hill, Preston, Sudlersville, Goldsboro, Queen Anne, Woodside, Viola and Hartly. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
